plot: Animated series for kids about the elephant Mira and the horse Marie who despite of not being very alike are the best friends in the whole wide world.
plot_en: Animated series for kids about the elephant Mira and the horse Marie who despite of not being very alike are the best friends in the whole wide world.

title: Mira + Marie
